sourcesContent:
<template>
    <a-modal
      title="命令集"
      style="top: 20px;"
      :width="1200"
      v-model="showIframe"
      @ok="handleSubmit">
        <iframe :src="cmdSrc"  ref="iframe" style="width:100%;height:600px;border:none"></iframe>
    </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
import { addData, queryData } from '@/api/common'
import { STable } from '@/components'
export default {
  name: 'TableList',
  components: {
    STable
  },
  data() {
    return {
      confirmLoading: false,
      form: this.$form.createForm(this),
      showIframe:false,
      cmdSrc:'http://localhost:8000/robot.html'
    }
  },
  methods: {
    show(title,mapId) {
       let user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'));
       let param = '?orgId='+ user.orgId+ '&createBy='+ user.id +
       '&circulation=1' + '&mapId=' + mapId + '&title='+ title
       console.log('--------------cmdSrc',this.cmdSrc + param)
       this.cmdSrc = this.cmdSrc + param;
       this.showIframe = true;
    },
    
    handleSubmit() {
      let cmdStr = this.$refs.iframe.contentWindow.document.getElementById("number")
      let cmdId =  cmdStr.innerHTML
      if(cmdId == 0){
        this.$message.error('请先点击左下角保存按钮')
      }
      this.$emit('getCmdId',cmdId)
      console.log('--------------命令集id：',cmdId);
    },
    filterOption(input, option) {
      return option.componentOptions.children[0].text.toLowerCase().indexOf(input.toLowerCase()) >= 0
    },
  }
}
</script>
<style>
.ant-upload-select-picture-card i {
  font-size: 32px;
  color: #999;
}

.ant-upload-select-picture-card .ant-upload-text {
  margin-top: 8px;
  color: #666;
}
.anticon anticon-eye-o {
  display: none;
}
.ant-upload-list-item-actions a {
  display: none;
}
</style>
